what: Check if you have API token from Kobotoolbox
title: Usage
text: output usually like encoding supplied: defaulting UTF-8. $token [1] "nask976bdshuiqw9829nsh718"
code: library(KoboconnectR) get_kobo_token(url = "eu.kobotoolbox.org", uname = "userid", pwd = "password")

title: Usage
text: Extracting data two step process. Step one identify asset id. next use asset id extract data.

what: Check the assets you have access to
title: Usage
text: output simplified data frame simplified =T used kobotools_api function. data frame, can find asset id need ((column asset)).
code: kobotools_api(url = "eu.kobotoolbox.org", simplified = T, uname = "userid", pwd = "password")

title: Usage
text: Use asset id plug kobotools_kpi_data function download data. returns list json file. Main data usually inside results. Following shows summary list downloaded one kobotools_kpi_data query. Downloading: 8.4 kB              Length Class  Mode    count     1     -none- numeric next      0     -none- NULL    previous  0     -none- NULL    results  39     -none- list
code: kobotools_kpi_data(assetid = "assetid", url = "eu.kobotoolbox.org", uname = "username", pwd = "password")

title: Usage
text: ‘Kobotoolbox’ provides ability create export survey results. exports can different formats including ‘csv’ ‘xls’. manual process mentioned documentation.

what: Viewing the list of existing exports
title: Usage
text: Using ‘kobo_exports()’ function, can view list existing exports. includes URL ‘xls’ ‘csv’ file can use download, import read files R.
code: kobo_exports(url = "eu.kobotoolbox.org", uname = "", pwd = "")

title: Usage
text: Exported data updated automatically new data entered survey. , may need create new export accommodate new data. create export, use ‘kobo_export_create()’ function. Please note ‘Kobotoolbox’ limited memory may delete existing exports manually clean . successful execution, URL created export returned printed. can use URL download, import read data R. Find dummy example create export download csv Kobotoolbox R
code: kobo_export_create(   url = "eu.kobotoolbox.org", uname = "", pwd = "",   assetid = "", type = "csv", all = "false", lang = "_default",   hierarchy = "false", include_grp = "true", grp_sep = "/" )

title: Usage
text: new function Creates export csv Downloads export (returns) Deletes exports download
code: kobo_df_download(   uname = "username", pwd = "password", assetid = "asset",   lang = "English (en)" )

title: Usage
text: Works principle kobo_df_download, except exported file excel format.
code: kobo_xls_dl(   uname = "username", pwd = "password", assetid = "asset",   lang = "English (en)" )

title: Usage
text: function downloads file using kobo_df_download finds columns media links downloads files loop. process time consuming may face errors due timeouts server load issues. case want use function, use data downloaded using kobo_df_download find columns media links exist. loop values column (download using function download.file()).
code: kobo_media_downloader(uname = "uid", pwd = "password", assetid = "assetid")

title: Usage
text: Please feel free add issue suggestions github

title: Authors and Citation
text: Asitav Sen. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Sen (2024). KoboconnectR: Download Data Kobotoolbox R. R package version 2.0.0, https://asitav-sen.github.io/KoboconnectR/, https://github.com/asitav-sen/KoboconnectR.
code: @Manual{,   title = {KoboconnectR: Download Data from Kobotoolbox to R},   author = {Asitav Sen},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 2.0.0,     https://asitav-sen.github.io/KoboconnectR/},   url = {https://github.com/asitav-sen/KoboconnectR}, }

what: Download Data from Kobotoolbox to R
title: Download Data from Kobotoolbox to R
text: goal KoboconnectR facilitate data extraction Kobotoolbox projects/assets R, instead downloading individual spreadsheet files.

title: Download Data from Kobotoolbox to R
text: CRAN version can downloaded : effort still early stage. development version can installed GitHub :
code: install.packages("KoboconnectR") # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("asitav-sen/KoboconnectR")

title: Download Data from Kobotoolbox to R
text: able use kobotoolbox API, one needs set API token. kobotoolbox documentation lists multiple ways one extract token value. token, easiest way retrieve using get_kobo_token() function. find asset id, one can use kobotools_api() function returns list assets user access .
code: kobotools_kpi_data(assetid= "assetid", url="kobo.humanitarianresponse.info", uname="username", pwd="password") kobotools_api(url="kobo.humanitarianresponse.info", simplified=T, uname="userid", pwd="password")

title: Download Data from Kobotoolbox to R
text: DOWNLOAD FAILS, TRY INCREASING SLEEP PARAMETER (use dev version please). details, check vignette.
code: KoboconnectR::kobo_df_download(uname = "username",                                           pwd="password", assetid = "assetid",                                           lang = "English (en)", all="false", lang="_default",                                hierarchy="false", include_grp="true",grp_sep="/",fsep=";",                               multi_sel="both", media_url="true", fields=NULL, sub_ids=NULL, sleep=2)

title: Download Data from Kobotoolbox to R
text: package stable still early stages development. help enhance highly appreciated. Please feel free fork, add/modify create pull requests.

title: Download Data from Kobotoolbox to R
text: Please feel free add issue suggestions github

title: Download Data from Kobotoolbox to R
text: following packages required install run package. Package httr Package jsonlite Package curl Package mime Package openssl Package R6 Package methods Package readxl Package rlang Package purrr

what: Know your API token or check — get_kobo_token
title: Know your API token or check — get_kobo_token
text: `get_kobo_token` wrapper kobotoolbox API `https://"[url]"/token/?format=json`

title: Know your API token or check — get_kobo_token
code: get_kobo_token(   url = "eu.kobotoolbox.org",   uname = "",   pwd = "",   encoding = "UTF-8" )

title: Know your API token or check — get_kobo_token
text: url `[url]` kobotoolbox. Default "eu.kobotoolbox.org". uname username kobotoolbox account pwd password account encoding encoding used. Default "UTF-8".

title: Know your API token or check — get_kobo_token
text: function returns token associated id password given url.

title: Know your API token or check — get_kobo_token
text: function returns API token.

what: Creates a data frame after creating a 'csv' export and downloading it — kobo_df_download
title: Creates a data frame after creating a 'csv' export and downloading it — kobo_df_download
text: `kobo_df_download` wrapper kobotoolbox API

title: Creates a data frame after creating a 'csv' export and downloading it — kobo_df_download
code: kobo_df_download(   url = "eu.kobotoolbox.org",   uname = "",   pwd = "",   assetid = "",   all = "false",   lang = "_default",   hierarchy = "false",   include_grp = "true",   grp_sep = "/",   fsep = ";",   multi_sel = "both",   media_url = "true",   fields = NULL,   sub_ids = NULL,   sleep = 2 )

title: Creates a data frame after creating a 'csv' export and downloading it — kobo_df_download
text: url `[url]` kobotoolbox Default "eu.kobotoolbox.org". uname username kobotoolbox account pwd password account assetid id asset export created takes logical value string format. Used specify whether fields form versions included export.Acceptable values "true" "false". Default value "false". lang takes language. e.g. "English (en)". "XML Values headers", use '_xml'. hierarchy takes logical value string format. Used specify whether group hierarchy displayed labels. Acceptable values "true" "false". Default value "false". include_grp defines whether include groups. Default value "true". grp_sep group separator. Default value "/". fsep separator downloaded csv file. cases, ";", default. However, notice separator downloaded data "," something else, can change . multi_sel used specify display multiple_select-type responses. Valid inputs include "", "summary" "details". Default "". media_url include additional column media-type questions ("question_name_URL") URL link hosted file. Valid inputs "true" "false". Default value true. fields array column names included export (including group hierarchy). Valid inputs include: array containing string value matches XML column name, empty array result columns included, "fields" included "export_settings", columns included export sub_ids array submission ids filter exported submissions specified array ids. Valid inputs include array containing integer values empty array. sleep sleep time API actions. example, takes time download export. R wait download finish going next step. Hence need provide break consecutive API actions. Default value 2 (seconds).

title: Creates a data frame after creating a 'csv' export and downloading it — kobo_df_download
text: function returns data frame data downloaded 'Kobotoolbox'.

title: Creates a data frame after creating a 'csv' export and downloading it — kobo_df_download
text: function creates export survey data 'csv'. successful, attempts download data return data frame. Finally, function attempts delete export.

title: Create an export — kobo_export_create
text: `kobo_export_create` wrapper kobotoolbox API `https://[kpi-URL]/api/v2/assets/[asset-uid]/exports/`

title: Create an export — kobo_export_create
code: kobo_export_create(   url = "eu.kobotoolbox.org",   uname = "",   pwd = "",   assetid = "",   type = "csv",   all = "false",   lang = "_default",   hierarchy = "false",   include_grp = "true",   grp_sep = "/",   multi_sel = "both",   fields = NULL,   media_url = "true",   sub_ids = NULL,   qry = NULL,   flatten = "true",   sleep = 3 )

title: Create an export — kobo_export_create
text: url `[url]` kobotoolbox Default "eu.kobotoolbox.org". uname username kobotoolbox account pwd password account assetid id asset export created type specifies export format. Valid formats include "csv","xls", "spss_labels" "geojson" takes logical value string format. Used specify whether fields form versions included export.Acceptable values "true" "false". Default value "false". lang takes language. e.g. "English (en)". "XML Values headers", use '_xml'. hierarchy takes logical value string format. Used specify whether group hierarchy displayed labels. Acceptable values "true" "false". Default value "false". include_grp defines whether include groups. Default value "true". grp_sep group separator. Default value "/". multi_sel used specify display multiple_select-type responses. Valid inputs include "", "summary" "details". Default "". fields array column names included export (including group hierarchy). Valid inputs include: array containing string value matches XML column name, empty array result columns included, "fields" included "export_settings", columns included export media_url include additional column media-type questions ("question_name_URL") URL link hosted file. Valid inputs "true" "false". Default value true. sub_ids array submission ids filter exported submissions specified array ids. Valid inputs include array containing integer values empty array.#' qry JSON object containing Mongo filter query filtering exported submissions. Valid inputs include JSON object containing valid Mongo query empty JSON object (filtering) flatten boolean (form string) value relevant exporting "geojson" format. Valid inputs "true" "false" sleep sleep time API actions. example, takes time download export. R wait download finish going next step. Hence need provide break consecutive API actions. Default value 2 (seconds).

title: Create an export — kobo_export_create
text: function creates export, prints returns URL export created

title: Create an export — kobo_export_create
text: function creates export survey data. successful, returns URL data can directly downloaded/read/imported R.

what: See list of exports created — kobo_exports
title: See list of exports created — kobo_exports
text: `kobo_exports` wrapper kobotoolbox API `https://[kpi-url]/api/v2/assets/[assetid]/exports/`

title: See list of exports created — kobo_exports
code: kobo_exports(   url = "eu.kobotoolbox.org",   uname = "",   pwd = "",   encoding = "UTF-8",   assetid = "",   simplified = FALSE )

title: See list of exports created — kobo_exports
text: url `[url]` kobotoolbox. Default "eu.kobotoolbox.org". uname username kobotoolbox account pwd password account encoding encoding used. Default "UTF-8" assetid asset id simplified TRUE, return simple data frame selected data, FALSE returns full list.

title: See list of exports created — kobo_exports
text: function returns list exports available account id password entered.

title: See list of exports created — kobo_exports
text: function returns export views.

what: Downloads media data from Kobotoolbox — kobo_media_downloader
title: Downloads media data from Kobotoolbox — kobo_media_downloader
text: `kobo_media_downloader` downloads media data downloaded using `kobo_df_download`. Loops media columns downloads files individually.

title: Downloads media data from Kobotoolbox — kobo_media_downloader
code: kobo_media_downloader(   url = "eu.kobotoolbox.org",   uname,   pwd,   assetid,   fsep = ";",   sleep = 2,   identifier = "URL",   timeoutval = 300,   destfolder = "media" )

title: Downloads media data from Kobotoolbox — kobo_media_downloader
text: url `[url]` kobotoolbox Default "eu.kobotoolbox.org". uname username kobotoolbox account pwd password account assetid id asset export created fsep separator downloaded csv file. cases, ";", default. However, sleep sleep time API actions. example, takes time download export. R wait download finish going next step. Hence need provide break consecutive API actions. Default value 2 (seconds). identifier key using columns URL identified. Default value "URL" cases, columns containing URL values end "URL". Please note column name similar value may cause error. timeoutval timeout value seconds download media files. Default 300 seconds. destfolder folder media stored.

title: Downloads media data from Kobotoolbox — kobo_media_downloader
text: function returns data frame data downloaded 'Kobotoolbox'.

title: Downloads media data from Kobotoolbox — kobo_media_downloader
text: function creates export survey data 'csv'. successful, attempts download data returns data frame. data frame, function extracts URLs media attempts download .

what: Downloads data (xls type) from Kobotoolbox — kobo_xls_dl
title: Downloads data (xls type) from Kobotoolbox — kobo_xls_dl
text: `kobo_xls_dl` wrapper kobotoolbox API attemps download data excel compatible formal.

title: Downloads data (xls type) from Kobotoolbox — kobo_xls_dl
code: kobo_xls_dl(   url = "eu.kobotoolbox.org",   uname = "",   pwd = "",   assetid = "",   all = "false",   lang = "_default",   hierarchy = "false",   include_grp = "true",   grp_sep = "/",   multi_sel = "both",   media_url = "true",   fields = NULL,   sub_ids = NULL,   sleep = 2 )

title: Downloads data (xls type) from Kobotoolbox — kobo_xls_dl
text: url `[url]` kobotoolbox Default "eu.kobotoolbox.org". uname username kobotoolbox account pwd password account assetid id asset export created takes logical value string format. Used specify whether fields form versions included export.Acceptable values "true" "false". Default value "false". lang takes language. e.g. "English (en)". "XML Values headers", use '_xml'. hierarchy takes logical value string format. Used specify whether group hierarchy displayed labels. Acceptable values "true" "false". Default value "false". include_grp defines whether include groups. Default value "true". grp_sep group separator. Default value "/". multi_sel used specify display multiple_select-type responses. Valid inputs include "", "summary" "details". Default "". media_url include additional column media-type questions ("question_name_URL") URL link hosted file. Valid inputs "true" "false". Default value true. fields array column names included export (including group hierarchy). Valid inputs include: array containing string value matches XML column name, empty array result columns included, "fields" included "export_settings", columns included export sub_ids array submission ids filter exported submissions specified array ids. Valid inputs include array containing integer values empty array. sleep sleep time API actions. example, takes time download export. R wait download finish going next step. Hence need provide break consecutive API actions. Default value 2 (seconds).

title: Downloads data (xls type) from Kobotoolbox — kobo_xls_dl
text: function returns data frame data downloaded 'Kobotoolbox'.

title: Downloads data (xls type) from Kobotoolbox — kobo_xls_dl
text: function creates export survey data 'xls'. successful, attempts download data return data frame (reading using `readxl::read_excel`).

title: Check kobotoolbox API and retrieve overall info about the projects/assets — kobotools_api
text: function takes two variables. First one `url` `[kpi-url]`. users "eu.kobotoolbox.org" "kf.kobotoolbox.org". Former default. second parameter `simplified` takes logical value. set true, function return selected values parsed data return data frame. set false, json returned details.

title: KoboconnectR 1.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-10-18 Changed function kobo_xls_dl() include multiple sheets. Changed test files rectify errors CRAN (Bug fixes).

title: KoboconnectR 1.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-10-16 Added new function kobo_media_downloader downloads media kobo assets.

title: KoboconnectR 1.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-05-23 Resolved issues API reacting parameters. example, setting include_media_url “true” actually include medial url. Also, resolved issues causing last version fail tests. Specifically, failing gracefully issue coming internet resource.

title: KoboconnectR 1.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-05-16 New function kobo_df_download added, enables direct download csv file. csv export created downloaded. export deleted.

title: KoboconnectR 1.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-03-29 Ver 1.0 done, aim submit package CRAN Eliminated old functions used older version ‘Kobotoolbox’ APIs Simplified authentication. Instead using API token, now user id password sufficient Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Supports export creation enable download ‘csv’ ‘xls’ files.
